description1: Tax deduction is a tax reduction for services close to the household, such as moving assistance and moving cleaning. If you are entitled to a tax deduction, you only pay 50% of the work cost.
description2: The maximum sum for "Rot" and "Rut" deductions is SEK 75,000 per year (of which a maximum of SEK 50,000 rotÂ  deductions).
description3: You can retrieve your data from the Swedish Tax Agency, if you want to see your current balance here on Flyttsmart.
description4_Text: Read more on the Swedish Tax Agency's website.
